title: Lesson 61 – Before and Previously; Bago and Dati

contents.markdown: This lesson covers some common ways to say “before” and “previously” in Tagalog by using _bago_ and _dati_.
As an adverb, _bago_ means “before”. It can be used with a noun.

item.english: before the car (this can also mean “the car is new” - see bago as an adjective below)

item.tagalog: Gusto kong pumunta doon bago ang Huwebes.
item.english: I want to go there before Thursday.

item.tagalog: Kinain niya ang lechon bago ang trabaho.
item.english: She ate the lechon before work.

contents.markdown: It can also be used with a clause.

item.tagalog: Sinagot niya ang tanong bago ko siya tinanong.
item.english: She answered the question before I asked her.

item.tagalog: Bago ako maglalaro ng basketball, magbibisikleta ako.
item.english: Before I play basketball I will bicycle.

item.tagalog: Kailangan niyang bumili ng manok bago magluto ng adobo.
item.english: She needs to buy chicken before cooking adobo.

contents.markdown: In the last example, notice that the infinitive _magluto_ means “cooking”; you saw something similar with _tapos_. As an adjective, _bago_ means “new”.
As an adverb, _dati_ means “previously”. It is normally placed at the end of a phrase.

item.tagalog: Hindi siya mahilig sa sasakyan dati.
item.english: He did not like cars previously.

item.tagalog: Nagturo ang guro ng Tagalog dati.
Mas gusto ko ang dating sasakyan.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Wala si Joaquin sa Luzon dati.
exampleSentences.english: Joaquin was not in Luzon previously.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Gusto ni nanay ng tunay na bahay at bagong trabaho.
exampleSentences.english: Mother wants a real house and a new job.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Huwag mong pagtawanan ang dati mong asawa.
Pumunta siya sa Parañaque bago ang Oktubre.
exampleSentences.english: He went to Parañaque before October.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Pinaglutuan nila ng adobo ang kawali dati.
exampleSentences.english: They cooked adobo in the pan previously.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Pag-usapan natin ang dati niyang pangalan.
exampleSentences.english: Let's have a discussion about her former name.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Hindi ka puwedeng magluto ng adobo bago bumili ng manok.
exampleSentences.english: You cannot cook adobo before buying chicken.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Hindi siya nanonood ng TV dati.
exampleSentences.english: He did not watch TV previously.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Parang dating bisikleta ko ang bagong bisikleta mo.
exampleSentences.english: Your new bike seems like my previous bike.
